nodes.text: Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beginner Game
The Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beginner Game is a book and roleplaying adventure for Star Wars: Age of Rebellion. It is published by Fantasy Flight Games on April 25, 2014.

The perfect entry into the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying experience for players of all skill levels. With its complete learn-as-you-go adventure, players can opern the box and immediately dive into their roles as members of the Rebel Alliance, desperately fighting against the superior might of the galactic Empire. Pre-generated character folios keep the rules right at your fingertips, while custom dice and an exciting narrative gameplay system advance your story with every roll.
In addition to the included items, the Beginner Game also features two downloadable Character Folios for Arkhan Brem'tu and Jin-Rio.
